title: Iperius Backup 4.5.5 Full Cracked
description:
Iperius Backup 4.5.5 Full version


Original setup file + Portable version Cracked


Iperius Backup - Complete backup and recovery solutions

Iperius is one of the best programs for tape backup. It is compatible with any tape drive, like DAT and high-capacity LTO Ultrium devices. It includes advanced features like compression and AES encryption, restore of individual files and incremental backup. Finally, it allows to configure different backup types and numerous options, at a very affordable cost.


*  Drive image backup (disaster recovery)
*  Open file backup (VSS)
*  Backup to Google Drive, Amazon S3, Azure Storage, OneDrive, Dropbox
*  Backup of any database
*  Backup of VMware ESXi / Hyper-V virtual machines
*  Hot backup: no interruption
*  Backup of Hyper-V virtual machines
*  Incremental and hot Hyper-V backup
*  Backup to NAS, USB drives, RDX, etc.
*  FTP, FTPS, SFTP Backup
*  Backup to any Tape (LTO, DAT, etc.)
*  Backup to multiple tape drives
*  Remote backup FTP/SFTP
*  Incremental, differential, full backup and synchronization
*  Hot backup with no interruption
*  Hardware independent restore
*  Upload and Download of websites
*  Flexible backup retention policies
*  Automatic Restore
*  Restore of individual files
*  Hardware independent restore
*  Compression and AES encryption
*  Scheduling of automatic backups
*  SQL Server 2005/2008/2012/Express
*  Oracle backup
*  MySQL and MariaDB backup
*  PostgreSQL backup
*  Compatible with ESXi 4.0/4.1/5.0/5.1/5.5/6/Free
*  Unlimited Hosts and VMs
*  Installation as service
*  Lightweight and portable
*  E-mail notifications
*  Can be interfaced with Web Console
*  Running of external scripts

Changelog: http://www.iperiusbackup.com/news.aspx


Installation:

For a standard installation run the included setup file, then replace the original Iperius.exe file with the cracked one in portable cracked dir, make sure the Iperius process is not running during the replacing action.

For a portable use copy the Portable Cracked dir in your harddisk and start Iperius.exe.

The Iperius Backup is already fully unlocked.

Enjoy !!
